steps.title: Projects
steps.text: Any Project is accessible via the Dashboard. The Projects, which belong to or are shared with you, can be found here.

steps.title: Tutorials
steps.text: Clicking on a Tutorial will create a copy of that Project, which will appear in your own Projects tab with the same name as the Tutorial. Any changes you make to this copy will not affect the original Tutorial.
By clicking on the Bell, you will you see notifications about which Projects and Organizations have been shared with you.
Under the question mark, you find Manuals, Support and ways to give us Feedback. It also provides quick access to other Guided Tours.
The User Menu gives you access to Your Account, Preferences, Organizations and more.

projects.name: Projects
projects.description: All you need to know about Project handling

steps.title: Start Sim4Life.lite
steps.text: Clicking on this (+) Start Sim4Life.lite button, allows you to create and open a new Sim4Life.lite project

steps.title: Filter and Search
steps.text:
This tool allows you to filter Projects and Tutorials.
You can search and filter by:
- Title, description, owner, id...
- Tags
- Shared with

steps.title: More options button
steps.text: On the Project card, you can use the three dots button to access more information and operation on the Project.

steps.title: Update Services
steps.text: On the Project card, you can use the Update button to update the corresponding service to the latest version.
